name: button slasher 3000
description:
Davis Game Jam submission - part of a final project in CDM 175. A flurry of one button minigames. Right now, Megaton is the only game available.

Select a minigame using the number keys.

CONTROLS: huddle around one keyboard for maximum chaos.

  • Player 1: Q
  • Player 2: F
  • Player 3: J
  • Player 4: P
